info.description: This is the material tracking application's api for dealing with the materials
info.title: Material Tracker API

get.description: Safer and faster way to get newest checkout logs for given material
get.summary: fetches recent checkout logs for a given material id

get.description: gets all checkout logs if they exist

put.description: Adds checkin time to existing checkout log
put.summary: Adds checkin time to existing checkout log

post.description: Adds checkout log for a materials
Adds materials to the database using valid json structure

put.description: changes the quantity of the given material using it's id
put.summary: adjust quantity based on the requested amount

get.description: Can get material using its id, quantity and unit, type, or job site
get.summary: fetches material based on given  query parameters

parameters.description: quantity of material, must be combined with unit
parameters.name: quantity

parameters.description: unit of the quantity, must be combined with quantity
parameters.name: unit

parameters.description: site id of which material belongs to
parameters.name: site

post.description: Adds material log  to the database using valid json structure

parameters.description: Format of add material log request
parameters.name: materiallog

get.description: gets all material logs if they exist

put.description: changes the not field of a materiallog
put.summary: post changes not on a existing material log

parameters.description: Format of changing matterial note request
parameters.name: note_and-id

get.description: Safer and faster way to get newest material logs for given material
get.summary: fetches recent materials logs for a given material id

get.description: Can get material using it's id, or the material it relates to
get.summary: fetches material logs based on given query parameters

post.description: Adds job_site to the database using valid json structure

get.description: Gets jobsites using id(may add more parameters later)
get.summary: fetches job_site based on given paremeters

post.description: The use defined in the material database is only the bear essentials for logging
post.summary: adds user to the material database

post.description: Adds user to the database using valid json structure

delete.description: Deletes user using id(may add more parameters later)
delete.summary: removes user based on given paremeters

post.description: Replaces login cookie with an empty one that deletes itself instantly
Pulls user login information and authenticates the user

get.description: Gets user using id(may add more parameters later)
get.summary: fetches user based on given paremeters

post.description: Adds user to the database using valid json structure

put.description: Updates user using id(may add more parameters later)
put.summary: updates user based on given paremeters

get.summary: get user from the material database
